pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Bao3 gang1 Ji2 tuan2 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Li Xiannian was one of the major decision-makers and leaders in the construction of Baoshan Steelworks.
sentences.chinese: 李先念是宝钢建设的主要决策人和领导人之一。

sentences.english: The article introduces the quality, varieties and development of bar steels in Bao Steel.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了宝钢条钢产品的质量及品种开发。

sentences.english: This paper deals with one of the topics cn modern management at BISC.
sentences.chinese: 本文是宝钢企业现代化管理的研讨题目之一。

sentences.english: Edge crack is one of the main factors affecting quality of heavy plates manufactured by Baosteel.
sentences.chinese: 边裂是影响宝钢厚板质量的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the development and the application of the ultra fine grain C-Mn steel in BAO STEEL.
sentences.chinese: 本文简要介绍了宝钢碳锰超细晶粒钢的研制及应用。

sentences.english: The tube-crack status and running conditions of CDQ boiler of Baosteel since its commissioning are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简介宝钢CDQ锅炉投运以来的运行情况和爆管状况。

sentences.english: Baosteel Corporation is the first enterprise to issue environmental report in the iron and steel industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 宝钢股份是我国钢铁行业首家发布环境报告的企业。

sentences.english: Atmosphere corrosion resistant steel is one of the most important products in Baosteel.
sentences.chinese: 耐候钢是宝钢的一类重要产品。

sentences.english: The Baoshan Steel Group, a famous SOE, acquired private Ninbo Steel.
sentences.chinese: 宝钢集团，一个有名的国企，收购了私企宁波钢铁。

sentences.english: Slab-reheating furnaces in Baoshan Iron & Steel Corporation uses hydraulic walking beams to transport slabs.
sentences.chinese: 宝钢的板坯加热炉采用液压步进梁运送板坯。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the development of the water-quench heat treatment of oil-well tubulars by Baosteel Co.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了宝钢油井管水淬热处理技术的开发情况。

sentences.english: The practice of water saving work of Baoshan Iron & Steel Co. Ltd. is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了宝钢股份公司在节水工作中的实践。

sentences.english: New goals are set on the basis of summing up the records of water management during the past ten years.
sentences.chinese: 总结了宝钢十年水质管理工作实绩并提出了新的目标。

sentences.english: Now the micro-powder of Baosteel's blast furnace water granulated slag has been put into commercial production comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 宝钢的高炉水渣微粉已全面实现产业化。

sentences.english: But Baosteel is understood to be the frontrunner.
sentences.chinese: 但是认为宝钢是最有可能的获胜者。

sentences.english: The system has been used for actual production of Baosteel Yichang tandem cold mill.
sentences.chinese: 该系统已被宝钢益昌冷连轧机组生产应用。

pinyin: Wu3 han4 Gang1 tie3 Gong1 si1

definition: centrally-managed state-owned enterprise (PRC), abbr. for 中央企業|中央企业[zhong1 yang1 qi3 ye4]
to roll steel (into sheets or bars)
steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Bao3 gang1 Ji2 tuan2 Gong1 si1
